topic.title: Notes on the Type of the Present Text Edition (//fileDesc/editionStmt)

body.p: The Edition Statement contains in the subelement <edition> information on the type of the present DTA publication of the respective work.
body.codeblock: <editionStmt> <edition>[Type of DTA edition, i. e. "Vollst√§ndige digitalisierte Ausgabe" ("Complete digitized edition").]</edition> </editionStmt>
